room_title: Escape room "Saloon" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: Had a super time! Much was a great host! Seven of us did the saloon and escaped! Puzzles were creative and well thought out. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Saloon" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: Seven of us had a great time. Will be back! We did the Saloon.

room_title: Escape room "Saloon" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
review: We had such a blast. Went with my husband and four 14-year-old boys. We did the Saloon and escaped with a minute and a half left. Exciting, fun, and totally worth the price! The girl who was our guide was super friendly. I can't wait to go again! My heart was beating so fast when we opened the door. It was such a rush!
